metadata.title: CVE-2018-14345 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SDDM through 0.17.0. If configured withReuseSession=true, the password is not checked for users with an alreadyexisting session. Any user with access to the system D-Bus can thereforeunlock any graphical session. This is related to daemon/Display.cpp andhelper/backend/PamBackend.cpp.

criterions.comment: sddm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
